noun.description: The action or fact of blocking or obstructing someone or something.
examples: the issue led to the disruption of classes and the blocking of the Kakata highway by angry students

noun.description: The sudden halting of the flow of thought or speech, as a symptom of schizophrenia or other mental disorder.
The grouping or treatment of things (e.g., items of data or shades of color) in blocks.
